description.original: MySnippets is a plugin that adds a status bar menu allowing the user to quickly toggle their snippets on and off 🖌.
description.translation: MySnippets is a plugin that adds a status bar menu allowing the user to quickly toggle their snippets on and off 🖌.

dict..setDesc(\"Write the title for this CSS: .setDesc("为此 CSS 片段文件写入标题。")
dict..setDesc(\"Add in styling for this CSS s: .setDesc("为此 CSS 片段文件添加样式。")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose to change the backgrou: .setDesc("选择将背景从主题的辅助背景颜色更改为玻璃背景。")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose whether or not to open: .setDesc("选择是否在创建 CSS 片段文件后立即打开它们。它将在您的默认应用程序中打开。")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose whether or not to have: .setDesc("选择是否在创建新的 CSS 片段文件时自动切换为启用。")
dict..setDesc(\"Set default CSS styling as a: .setDesc("设置默认的 CSS 样式作为创建新 CSS 文件的模板。")
dict..appendText(\"If you like this Plugin an: .appendText("如果您喜欢这个插件并考虑捐赠以支持持续开发，请使用下方的按钮！")
dict.name: `Create new CSS snippet`: name: `创建新的 CSS 片段`
